des: The ad has successfully let people know about the product of the company.
The ad effectively shows why a company’s product or service is better than others.
The ad has a an opening and closing statement that sticks, making sure the product of the company stays in people’s minds.
The ad effectively communicates company’s values through branding.
The ad has a clear CTA (call to action) to let people know where and how to buy the product.
